testcase.classname: As an administrator, I want to be able to access coupon information via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request body containing invalid authorization information is sent to the /api/coupon/couponList
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "invalid" token.............passed * The api user sets "api/coupon/couponList" path parameters.................passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api coupon couponList endpoint, confirming that the status code is '401' and the reason phrase is Unauthorized..passed
